data.name: Escape Purgatory
data.detailed_description:
Set in a limbo realm, this strategic horror game, which has the choice of first-person or third-person charges the player with traversing the world while solving puzzles and challenges. With each discovery, collect items, repent your sins, and be freed from evil. Can you survive the wickedness within?

Story mode: You find yourself in a strange dark place with no one around to help. You solve different puzzles and present your findings to repent your sins and become free from evil.

Survival mode: How long can you last? With nonstop demons coming from all angles and no light at the end of the tunnel. Can you keep your inner light glowing?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
